p: The treatment of prostate and breast cancers with CBD have also been explored. Sarfaraz et al. [ 67] found that androgen-responsive human prostate carcinoma cells treated with CBD exhibited a pro-apoptotic response, inhibited cell growth, and a lowered secretion of prostate-specific antigen, which is typically elevated in cancerous cells [ 67]. Of several natural cannabinoids tested, a CBD extract provided the most potent cytotoxic effects against breast cancer cells, with significantly lower damage to healthy cells [ 70]. CBD induced apoptosis in a breast cancer cell line via the activation of the overexpressed CB2 receptor [ 70, 71].
